A few moments from the talk:
We have also experimented with style transfer + emotion recognition Basics of parametrized supervised learning (the cogwheels are just the parameters)

item.title: "What I cannot create, I do not understand"

item.title: Machines learning on their own
item.description: A few moments from the talk seq2seq Clustering instead of discrimination GANs More and more people got interested in AI

item.title: What would Prometheus bring today?
item.description: Thinking about recent speedup in the field of AI by incorporating our observations of natural learning dynamics will change not just the game of finance, medicine, law and education, but our daily lives as well. To emphasize it we draw an analogy between the usage of fire. Our talk had two main axes: Humanity have a long history of using something, actually way before understanding it - e.g. our digestion system has already evolved in such a way that we are no longer able to digest raw food, while until the 19th century it was not well defined what does actually happen inside.
